explanations.machine learning: The paper explicitly mentions the use of machine learning techniques, including binary classification algorithms, to analyze calendar anomalies in financial markets.
explanations.classification: The paper focuses on binary classification algorithms to model and predict the Day-of-the-week effect in financial markets.
explanations.feature representation: The paper discusses the use of two discriminant feature representation methods, including multi-day technical indicators and intra-day trading profile, to improve classification accuracy.
explanations.feature learning: The paper involves feature extraction and representation methods, which are part of feature learning, to enhance the performance of the classification system.
